Name: CryptoRIG
About the game: CryptoRIG is a semi-idle server management game focused on cryptocurrency mining and trading. Explore a range of features including: Managing servers from a resource and operation context. High level management of server clusters. Extensive research and progression opportunities to work your way up to mining more lucrative cryptocurrencies. Procedurally generated cryptocurrencies with simulated market trends. Fast paced intra-day trading of simulated cryptocurrencies. Automated trading based on user defined rules. Procedurally generated random events. Steam achievements Multiple game scenarios with varying difficulties and play styles Challenge yourself on the QUADSTAT VX exchange, manage endless instances of servers, shield yourself from the random, chaotic world events and optimise your cryptoRIG to take over the market! We look forward to getting your feedback and driving the final stages of game development. As always happy trading and HODL!
